allow: Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :3002 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /PID %a /F")
Bash(cmd /c "wmic process where ProcessId=55644 get CommandLine,ProcessId 2>nul")
Bash(cmd /c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :3002 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /PID %a /T /F")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement all 7 P2 competitive differentiator features

- Auto-Scheduling Engine: cascade reschedule shifts downstream FS tasks
  when a task''s end date changes, with activity logging
- Table View: sortable columns, inline editing \(status/priority/dates/progress\),
  double-click cells for quick edits
- Calendar View: monthly grid with task pills spanning date ranges,
  month navigation, color-coded by status
- Portfolio-Level Gantt: /portfolio page aggregating all projects into
  a unified timeline using the existing GanttChart component
- Advanced Security \(RBAC\): ProjectMemberService with role hierarchy
  \(owner/manager/editor/viewer\), member CRUD endpoints, audit trail
  with paginated activity log on the Team tab
- Workflow Automation: rule engine with triggers \(status_change,
  date_passed, progress_threshold\) and actions \(update_field,
  log_activity, send_notification\), CRUD endpoints, execution history,
  full rule builder UI on /workflows page
- Real-Time Collaboration: @fastify/websocket for server push,
  WebSocketService broadcasts task mutations, useWebSocket hook
  auto-reconnects and invalidates React Query cache

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd //c "for /f ""tokens=5"" %a in \(''netstat -ano ^| findstr :3001 ^| findstr LISTENING''\) do taskkill /PID %a /F")
